 Shanks and Judge on Andromeda together

Shanks and Judge back in Andromeda
DECEMBER 7, 2002

Stargate SG-1's own Michael Shanks ("Daniel Jackson") and Christopher Judge ("Teal'c") will make return appearances to Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda near the end of the current season -- in the same episode!

In a post at SlipstreamBBS, Andromeda writer Zack Stentz told fans that Shanks and Judge would play Remiel and Hector, respectively. The episode is currently filming, and is the last to shoot for Season Three (though it won't be the season finale).

The episode is an artificial intelligence story, and is titled "Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath" --

Expect the episode to air in U.S. syndication in the spring of 2003. More details on the episode as they become available!

http://www.gateworld.net/news/actor...39241361,59633,

12-09-2002 11:08 PM
ColJ
Jack O'Neill's De-briefer

Registered: Oct 2001
Location: Canada
Posts: 414

The episode is an artificial intelligence story, and is titled "Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath" -- indicating an obvious connection to the characters previously played by the actors. Shanks played the avatar of the warship The Balance of Judgment in Season One's "Star-Crossed;" Judge played the avatar of Balance's sister ship, The Wrath of Achilles, in Season Two's "The Knight, Death and the Devil."
